definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: The system realizes monitoring and control fuction of each link of coal mine main ventilator.
sentences.chinese: 該系統實現了對煤礦主通風機各個環節白勺監控功能。

sentences.english: The mine's owner says it may take two days to reach the trapped men.
sentences.chinese: 煤礦主表示需要兩天才能到達礦工被困之處。

sentences.english: The relatively high sums reflected the owners’ eagerness to suppress complaints.
sentences.chinese: 賠償金額相對較高，反映出礦主急於壓制怨言。

sentences.english: That's according to one of the mine's owners who says rescuers aren't sure the men survived the cave-in.
sentences.chinese: 據一煤礦主的說下陷的救助者尚不確定生死。

sentences.english: After the gold rush ended, the miners’ approach to water rights became an established custom.
sentences.chinese: 淘金潮退去後，礦主取得水權的方式成爲慣例。
